item.title: Poetry
item.description: Lǎozǐ # I am partial to the translation of Derek Lin Dàodéjīng - Chapter 11 (The use of what has no substantive existence) […] Mix clay to create a container In its emptiness, there is the function of a container […] Therefore, that which exists is used to create benefit That which is empty is used to create functionality Dàodéjīng - Chapter 15 (The exhibition of the qualities of the Dao) The Tao masters of antiquity
